data.comment: The match has started at Liberty Stadium.
Goal! Swansea have got their heads in front thanks to a Connor Roberts strike.
The first-half has come to a close in Swansea.
In the minute 45, Connor Roberts (Swansea) has received a yellow card from Leigh Doughty.
In the minute 53, Luton's Glen Rea has been booked in Swansea.
Matty Pearson is booked for the away team.
Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a first substitution, with Harry Cornick replacing Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall.
In the minute 62, Elliott Lee is replacing George Moncur for Luton at Liberty Stadium.
He's off! Matty Pearson is shown a red card.
Steve Cooper is making the team's first substitution at Liberty Stadium with Jamal Lowe replacing Liam Cullen.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Yan Dhanda with Kasey Palmer. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
Nathan Jones is making the team's third substitution at Liberty Stadium with Kazenga LuaLua replacing Luke Berry.
Steve Cooper (Swansea) is making a third substitution, with Joel Latibeaudiere replacing Marc Guehi.
In the minute 89, It's now 2-0 in Swansea as Andre Ayew scores for Swansea.
The home team have replaced Andre Ayew with Viktor Gyokeres. This is the fourth substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
